fullplot: In Vienna, in 1930, a young woman falls in love with a gambler and leaves her fiancè, a common butcher. They become a couple and have a baby, but he gets bored and leaves them. Without means to support herself, her downfall begins.
plot: In Vienna, in 1930, a young woman falls in love with a gambler and leaves her fiancè, a common butcher. They become a couple and have a baby, but he gets bored and leaves them. Without means to support herself, her downfall begins.
title: Tales from the Vienna Woods
